column1: Section:FIN-Cash Management, Monitor Cash Position (5 Reqs)

column4: Provide ability to calculate daily cash position.
Provide ability to adjust daily cash balances and create associated accounting entries.
Provide ability to adjust internal accounts and associated accounting entries.
Provide ability to automatically recognize cash that is available in an account outside the system.
